posts.post_title: FS T3 Turkey Red Hal Chase Checklist Back PSA 4
posts.post_content:
Hey all,

$1100 net to me via PayPal or Zelle.

Thanks,
Bob

PM to claim or any questions.

That's a great looking card Bob!

 Trent King
Thanks Trent! Hope all is well.
